author: Andrew Leeke
comment: I really like the design, but I wish there was a way of locking the watch face. Every single day I accidently change the colours to something terrible without realising.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Unfortunately the access to the settings is handled by the Android Wear OS. There is nothing I can do :( Your rating is a bit unfair

author: Mark Elliott
comment: Nice face with lots of flexibility. Saving presets is very useful, but there is a bug saving custom application shortcuts. Your selection is not included in the preset save.

author: Dan P
comment: My favorite face so far. I wish they had watch battery life as a widget too but other then that I love this face.

author: Anthony Banks-Walker
comment: Paid for the premium version only to find it does not work. I would recommend to anyone not to download this app.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help with some details about your issue I'll be happy to help you

author: Rene Moreno Jr
comment: Crashes ALL OF THE TIME!!!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Robert Rice
comment: Can't get it to go to my phone

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you try to install it directly from the Google Play store by searching for it? What is your issue? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Ketan Sood
comment: It is a pretty good watchface for android wear

author: Alisha Higginbotham
comment: Like it so far! Definitely my aesthetic!!

author: Thomas Hagan
comment: Good watch face.

author: JF S
comment: Best watch face I've found. Solid app. I emailed the app creator with a question and he answered fast with the answer I needed.

author: Cesar Rodriguez
comment: Great customization features, clean looking screen, not crowded

author: André Buckland
comment: Well, this is a crock. I originally downloaded this watch face to another phone, but all the "premium" (read useful) features were locked behind a paywall. I liked it enough to pay.....but now I've had to move to another phone and it seems I have to pay again to re-unlock the premium features. Not worth it. Kick rocks.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: You do not have to pay again  if you use the same Google account. The premium is automatically restored. Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Amil Night
comment: No fckn good !!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Do you have any issue associated to this rating? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: majid rezaee
comment: A do

author: Alec Robinson
comment: Great watch face! Has become the main one I use on my zenwatch 3.   Awesome SciFi aesthetic while being very functional and at a glance friendly.   Absolutely worth the couple bucks to unlock the full features.

author: Steven Lawler
comment: Pretty cool. Can you make the time show like Monday, W56, 2017-12-28 02:45 or allow us to enter in the date format our selves? Also some optional weather data like sundown time etc would be amazing.

author: Mark Newman
comment: Like this. Good customisable features. However could it be possible to add custom apps to the widgets? I have a Huawei Watch and I'd like pressing step counter or heart rate to launch Huawei Health and not Google Fit

reply.author: thema
reply.content: The widget are linked to their corresponding app. You can use the shortcuts on the side to execute some other applications.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Excellent watchface with full-color ambient mode, manual weather location, and hourly vibration, too bad it spams you with unsolicited notifications.

author: John Bellamy
comment: Wow. Very nice watch face. Well worth going premium.

author: Nick Overstreet
comment: Latest version brings notification spam. DO NOT INSTALL.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: You should receive only one notification for a new watch face. And as written in the notification screen, you can deactivate it in the settings of the watch face if you do not want to receive it :)

author: adam galpin
comment: I would like to know the battery of my phone

author: Paul Lyon
comment: Just got the App,  so far so good

author: Felix Lee
comment: Excellent on my Q Marshal Fossil

author: richard pearce
comment: Great app loved the versatility

author: Stealth_Touch
comment: It's a cool SUPER

author: Tetie Sessoms
comment: this is great I love it

author: Bruce Baptist
comment: Awesome watch face

author: Vincent Tabaquin
comment: Awesome foreal

author: Ron Regalado
comment: Couldn't get Google fit steps to work.  Was reading Motobody on my Moto 360 I guess.  Premium version.  Says Fit needs to be installed when it already is.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Where does it say that Google fit needs to be installed? Please send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Micke Edbor
comment: On the misfit vapor. Got the premium version for 2 dollar. It has all the functionality and what I want to see on the watch face. Worth buying premium for.

author: Eric Simpson
comment: Junk.  Can't change configuration from phone.  Won't sync.  And paid for premium.  Buyer beware!!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com, I'll be happy to help you.

author: yutao song
comment: best one, use as my default watch face

author: Vincent Lim
comment: The best watchface for the Ticwatch 2 so far!

author: alci tron
comment: Wonderful

author: Alvester Garnett
comment: What a wonderfully customizable watch face that crams in a lot of data options. I love that the outer ring of block icons has 4 zones that can be set to different shortcuts. I chose Calendar, Stopwatch & Timer. In the center are zones for info like phone battery, steps, & weather. This looks brilliant on my ZenWatch 3.

author: Santosh Peri
comment: I do not understand why does this app need permission to my photos ?? Like I do not see any need for looking for photos on my Android Wear screen . Which forces me to uninstall this app

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Not to the pictures, but to the external storage, to store settings, as described in the "what's new". The permission is just used to write the settings, and read what is written :)
All permissions usage are explained here : http://themaapps.com/privacy-policy/

author: Brian Grissom
comment: One of my favorite faces. I wish you could customize what the rings mean - like fitness goals % instead of battery

author: WKZ On Tech
comment: It's awesome, the blue and white combination pops on here, especially when my watch lights up out of nowhere at night..

author: Victor E. Diaz
comment: Agradable diseño, fácil de usar, colores personalizados, es de lo mejor
